question: Who has been conferred an honorary D.Litt by the Indian Institute of Engineering Science and Technology?
explanation: Former President Pranab Mukherjee will be conferred an honorary D.Litt by the Indian Institute of Engineering Science and Technology. Mukherjee will be conferred the honour during IIEST convocation for his role as a public figure for many decades. Mukherjee was also awarded an honorary D. Litt by Jadavpur University in December last year.
